div.bibl: Lietuva, May 24, 1912. [THE AMERICAN SOCIALIST PARTY GIVES A LECTURE]

body.p: The Latvian Section of the American Socialist Party invites the Lettish speaking Lithuanians to attend a lecture entitled "Value and Its Cause," to be given by a former member of the Second (Russian) Council, John Ozol.
The lecture will take place at Schmidt's Hall, Madison Street and Hamlin Avenue, near Garfield Park, on May 25. Admission will be free.
